```{jasmin, attr.source=".numberLines"}
.class public HelloWorld
.super java/lang/Object

.method public static main : ([Ljava/lang/String;)V
    .stack  2
    .locals 1
    getstatic java/lang/System out Ljava/io/PrintStream;
    ldc "Hello, world!"
    invokevirtual java/io/PrintStream println (Ljava/lang/Object;)V
    return
.end method
```

```{jasmin, attr.source=".numberLines", fig.cap=""}
.class public HelloWorld
.super java/lang/Object

.method public static main : ([Ljava/lang/String;)V
    .stack  2
    .locals 1
    invokestatic HelloWorld out ()Ljava/io/PrintStream;
    ldc "Hello, world!"
    invokevirtual java/io/PrintStream println (Ljava/lang/Object;)V
    return
.end method

.method private static synthetic out : ()Ljava/io/PrintStream;
    .stack  1
    .locals 0
    getstatic java/lang/System out Ljava/io/PrintStream;
    areturn
.end method
```
